SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDPROJECTLOOKUPID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets the ChildProject LookupID of the given LocationId
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDPROJECTLOOKUPID( @locationID uniqueidentifier ) returns nvarchar(100) with execute as caller as begin declare @projectLookupID nvarchar(100) = '' select @projectLookupID = fieldoffice.LOOKUPID from SPONSORSHIPLOCATION sl join CONSTITUENT fieldoffice on sl.FIELDOFFICEID = fieldoffice.ID WHERE sl.ID = @locationID;
return @projectLookupID; end
